overview: In the world of sex, there is often a very thin line between straight and gay. Straight Edge: Volume One features eleven different men in seven hot, man-on-man duo and solo sex scenes, performed by men both "straight" and "gay." The men who identify as straight do, however, enthusiastically participate in the gay sexual activity, giving you a private show of their private parts, giving in to their secret fantasies and pairing up for direct man-on-man nut-busting action. Watching this video, one will be hard-pressed to know - or care - which men are which. It's a non-issue.
title: Straight Edge: Volume 1
